ComicInfo.Title: Rites of Passage
ComicInfo.Summary: Rites of Passage: Thor battles Tempus to battle his way to the center of Immortus' castle to retrieve his hammer.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:15:33. [Issue ID 33307]
